nodes.text: Possums were bipedal, reptilian creatures hailing from the fourth moon of Yavin Prime. They possessed devices resembling goggles over their eyes. Luke Skywalker, shortly before assaulting the Galactic Empire's Death Star with the Rebel Alliance, encountered these creatures while exploring the Massassi ruins on the jungle moon.

Possums appeared in the 1987 Japanese Star Wars game, although the game's canonicity is ambiguous. Their name was revealed in the Japanese language manual of the game, in which it was rendered as ポッサム (possamu) in katakana syllabary.
